required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of BCD-020 in Therapy of Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter Open-label Randomized Study of BCD-020 (Rituximab, CJSC BIOCAD, Russia) Efficacy and Safety in Comparison With MabThera (F. Hoffmann-La Roche Ltd., Switzerland) in Monotherapy of CD20-positive Indolent Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma

oversight_info.authority: Russia: Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation
India: Drugs Controller General of India

brief_summary.textblock:
This international multi-center, randomized, controlled, open-label study will investigate the pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, efficacy and safety of BCD-020 (NN: rituximab, CJSC Biocad) versus MabThera (INN: rituximab, F. Hoffmann La Roche, Ltd.) both administered as a monotherapy of patients with indolent non-Hodgkin's lymphoma.
Patients will be randomized to receive 375 mg/m² BCD-020 as intravenous infusion once a week for 4 weeks or MabThera at the same regimen.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.description: Comparison of peripheral blood B-cell depletion and repletion after BCD-020 and MabThera intravenous administration
Estimation of the overall response rate in each treatment arm at the end of treatment

secondary_outcome.description: Estimation of of rituximab serum concentrations after administration of BCD-020 to that obtained after administration of MabThera
Assessment of complete response rates of BCD-020 and MabThera given as a monotherapy at the end/completion of the treatment
Evaluation of the safety profiles of BCD-020 and MabThera

secondary_outcome.measure: Levels of binding and neutralizing antibodies to rituximab
secondary_outcome.description: Immunogenicity assessment of BCD-020 and MabThera
Estimation of rituximab serum concentrations after administration of BCD-020 to that obtained after administration of MabThera

arm_group.description: Patients will receive MabThera at a dose of 375 mg/m2 intravenously once a week for four weeks (on days 1-8-15 and 22)
Patients will receive BCD-020 at a dose of 375 mg/m2 intravenously once a week for four weeks (on days 1-8-15 and 22)

intervention.description: Patients will receive rituximab at a dose of 375 mg/m2 intravenously once a week for 4 weeks (on day 1,8,15,22)
